topicName: Vitamin D deficiency in adults - treatment and prevention
topicSummary: Vitamin D is a fat soluble vitamin that regulates calcium and phosphate homeostasis and is therefore vital for musculoskeletal health.

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Vitamin D deficiency in adults - treatment and prevention: Summary

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Recommendation on who to treat changed to be in line with SACN guidelines SACN, 2018.

latestChanges.title: This is a new CKS topic
latestChanges.body: The evidence base has been reviewed in detail, and recommendations are clearly justified and transparently linked to the supporting evidence.
